parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the current instance.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique token generated by the client to guarantee the idempotency of the request. You can use the client to generate the value, but you must ensure that it is unique among different requests. The token can only contain ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: connectedInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the remote instance for which the network connection is established.
